    mergeron.gen.upp_tests¶

    Methods to compute intrinsic clearance rates and intrinsic enforcement rates from generated market data.

    Module Contents¶

    mergeron.gen.upp_tests.SaveData : TypeAlias = Literal[False] | tuple[Literal[True], ptb.File, ptb.Group][source]¶
    class mergeron.gen.upp_tests.INVRESCntsArgs[source]¶

    Bases: TypedDict

    Keyword arguments of function, sim_enf_cnts

    sample_size : int[source]¶
    seed_seq_list : list[numpy.random.SeedSequence] | None[source]¶

    save_data_to_file : SaveData[source]¶
    saved_array_name_suffix : str[source]¶
    mergeron.gen.upp_tests.sim_enf_cnts_ll(_mkt_sample_spec, _enf_parm_vec, _sim_test_regime, /, *, sample_size=10**6, seed_seq_list=None, nthreads=16, save_data_to_file=False, saved_array_name_suffix='')[source]¶

    A function to parallelize data-generation and testing

    The parameters _sim_enf_cnts_kwargs are passed unaltered to the parent function, sim_enf_cnts(), except that, if provided, seed_seq_list is used to spawn a seed sequence for each thread, to assure independent samples in each thread, and nthreads defines the number of parallel processes used. The number of draws in each thread may be tuned, by trial and error, to the amount of memory (RAM) available.

    Parameters:¶
    _enf_parm_vec : mergeron.core.guidelines_boundaries.HMGThresholds¶

    Guidelines thresholds to test against

    _mkt_sample_spec : mergeron.gen.MarketSpec¶

    Configuration to use for generating sample data to test

    _sim_test_regime : mergeron.gen.UPPTestRegime¶

    Configuration to use for testing

    saved_array_name_suffix : str¶

    Suffix to add to the array names in the HDF5 file

    save_data_to_file : SaveData¶

    Whether to save data to an HDF5 file, and where to save it

    sample_size : int¶

    Number of draws to simulate

    seed_seq_list : list[numpy.random.SeedSequence] | None¶

    List of seed sequences, to assure independent samples in each thread

    nthreads : int¶

    Number of parallel processes to use

    Returns:¶

    Arrays of UPPTestCounts

    Return type:¶

    mergeron.gen.UPPTestsCounts

    mergeron.gen.upp_tests.sim_enf_cnts(_mkt_sample_spec, _upp_test_parms, _sim_test_regime, /, *, sample_size=10**6, seed_seq_list=None, nthreads=16, save_data_to_file=False, saved_array_name_suffix='')[source]¶
